About

  • A Software Engineer, JBoss Developer, with over 7 years experience in JBoss/WildFly, Java/JEE. Open Source enthusiasm, work on several Open Source Projects, good at Open Source development/maintaining, proficiency in Java/JEE programming, Middleware architecture, performance tuning, etc.

  • A Reviewer of WildFly Performance Tuning, WildFly Cookbook Packet Publishing.

Projects

You can find most of the projects I’m working on at GitHub. Some of my recent work include working on the following projects:

  • Teiid Maintaining and Supporting the code base, debugging and fixing issues, building patches, carry out performance tests, profiling, and tuning, etc

  • jBPM Dugging and fixing issues, building patches, participate in project forums, community IRC, JIRA, etc

  • CustomizedTools Personal Open Source Project, an intelligent troubleshooting tool for JVM/Java/JEE performance tuning, profiling, etc

  • Jcommerce A Spring, Hibernate, GWT based online shopping Open Source project.
